mapper.select: select a.name,b.deptId,count(*) as count,a.parentId,a.leaf from h_org_department a, h_org_dept_user b where b.userId in ( select JSON_UNQUOTE(userid -> '$[0].id') AS userid from igpgf_scale_test_acore GROUP BY userid ) and b.deptId=a.id GROUP BY b.deptId order By count desc

select a.name,b.deptId,count(*) as count,a.parentId,a.leaf,c.deptCount as personCount from h_org_department a, h_org_dept_user b, (select a.deptId,count(*) as deptCount from h_org_dept_user a, h_org_user b where a.userId=b.id group by deptId) c where b.userId in ( select JSON_UNQUOTE(userid -> '$[0].id') AS userid from igpgf_scale_test_acore GROUP BY userid ) and a.id=c.deptId and b.deptId=a.id and a.name like concat('%',#{name}) GROUP BY b.deptId order By count desc

select sum(t.count) from ( select a.name,b.deptId,count(*) as count,a.parentId from h_org_department a, h_org_dept_user b where b.userId in( select JSON_UNQUOTE(userid -> '$[0].id') AS userid from igpgf_scale_test_acore GROUP BY userid) and b.deptId=a.id and (a.name like '%站' or a.name like '%大队' or a.name like '%班') GROUP BY b.deptId order By count desc ) t
